content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -25.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The steam engine is intended to generate electricity, while the boiler is used to convert water into steam, and the offshore pump is used to supply water to the boiler.

### Copper plate mine at position(-18, -49)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18, -49) and a furnace at position (-18, -49).
- Burner mining drill (position 5, -73) and a furnace at position (5, -73).

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of a lab (position -17.5, 23.5) which is used for research and development.

### Copper cable factory at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) and inserter that puts into the assembling machine.
- Beltgroup connecting the furnace at position (-18, -49) to the assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5).

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to boiler and steam engine connectivity
- Ensure that the boiler is connected to a suitable pipe group to allow for water flow. Check for any missing connections or obstructions.
- Verify that the steam engine is connected to the power network and that the boiler is operational to generate steam.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Ensure that all necessary resources are available for crafting and that the machines are supplied with the required ingredients.
